Description:
Detects browsers starting with the remote debugging flags. Which is a technique often used to perform browser injection attacks

Author: pH-T (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Browser Started with Remote Debugging
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\firefox.exe' and command like '% -start-debugger-server%') or command like '% --remote-debugging-%')
